REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Addiction counsel
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After recovering from a joywire addiction, NAME adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others. Travelling between communities, HE used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AI programmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME enlisted in the military's robotics division, developing smarter combat AI. The whole time HE was there, HE never spoke with another human. HECAP spent all HIS time conversing with the AI HE was developing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Army scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME did scientific research for a planetary army. HECAP studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artificer rampant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and HIS own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary. HECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bandit leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME rose up the ranks of the crime organization, eventually becoming the leader of one of their most remote cells of bandits. HISCAP dog Rest never left HIS side.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Behaviour research
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Captured as a feral child, NAME was forced into the ways of modern society. HECAP quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility. HECAP specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. HECAP never had interest in plants, however.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith shooter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young blacksmith, NAME's family shop was raided by the police. HECAP shot two officers before they knocked HIM out and arrested HIM. Sentenced to life in prison, NAME learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the civil war ended, NAME had to find a new way to use HIS fighting skills. HECAP decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that HE enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Business gangster
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Staying one step ahead of the law, NAME became a legitimate businessperson and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, NAME's good fortune continued while HIS competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Clone farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves - particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Crime lord
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord. HECAP relied less on HIS fists and more on HIS guns. HISCAP reputation spread faster due to HIS cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal tinker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME joined a crew of mercenaries, helping to maintain their fusion reactor and nuclear weapons. HECAP quickly became their leader's right hand and took over when the opportunity arose, connecting the leader's shower to the ship's waste disposal acid.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Defense lawyer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME found that HE could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where HIS silver tongue could be useful, HE turned to the law. HECAP often defended the illegal speeder racers HE grew up with.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Destroyer-general
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military. HECAP was known for HIS mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Doomsday pariah
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME managed to open a vault of otherworldly technology while scavenging a dig site. HE unwittingly triggered a doomsday device that cleansed the planet of all life. More interested in the tech than human life, HE boarded the vault's spacecraft and departed to find more relics to abuse.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreaded dude
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets. There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Energy researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. HECAP made an error which destroyed HIS lab and most of the city. HECAP fled the planet to escape the authorities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Envoy of the stars
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values HE took with HIM on every mission. HISCAP prestigious position distanced HIM from backbreaking manual labor, allowing HIM to focus on HIS wordsmithing abilities. HECAP left the blacksmithing to others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Executive officer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating HIS way up the corporate ladder, HE was framed for the murder of another executive and her family. HECAP was found guilty. However, because of HIS family's influence, HE was exiled instead of put to death.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Exiled researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's love of robotics was not appreciated in HIS technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated HIM, and HE was never allowed to return.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Faction leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Early in HIS adulthood, NAME found HIMself surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes. For fun, HE gathered them and lead them to a certain death. HECAP knew then that HE had the talent to realize HIS ambitions of leadership.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fervent researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young adult, NAME was sure that HIS planet and its people were nearing their time of transcendence. A firm belief that HIS research would be the catalyst drove HIM to increasingly alarming acts as bureaucrats and bioethics committees worked to stall HIS progress.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fighter controller
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During the Zartha crisis, NAME fought across many worlds, providing the vital link between the ground and the air as a fighter controller. During the campaign, HE saw friends injured and killed. This mental trauma haunts HIS dreams to this day, but HIS aim remains sharp.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Flaneur
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME strolled and sipped HIS way through the streets and cafes of HIS world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached. Through all this time, HE remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang boss
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To survive, NAME's gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes HE had to kill the guards. Sometimes HE had to kill the police who arrived to stop HIM. After years of this, HE became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gnomebiologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. HECAP went to conferences and managed an art gallery. However, HE never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be HIS true profession.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME took the time to admire the beauty of the world. HISCAP passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but HE tried to adapt to HIS changing life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hired gun
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME always wanted to prove HE could make a living without HIS parents' help. HECAP did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people. HECAP eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. HECAP discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a master hunter. HECAP learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Intelligence agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of HIS hacking skills, NAME was recruited by HIS home planet's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained HIM in combat, but HE prefers psychological warfare. Government rules proved too strict for HIM, so HE went rogue. HISCAP current activities are unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Involuntary hermit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's escape pod was jettisoned onto an unexplored region of a frontier world. HECAP eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company. Later, HE was spotted clad in pygmy wombat furs, discussing the importance of hoof hygiene with a group of elderly muffalo.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lost marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in HIS planet's military, NAME disappeared without a trace. Later, HE reappeared at the head of HIS own military force. No one knows why HE became who HE was.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Machine fixer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen. After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, HE learned how to patch HIMself up pretty well. Despite the pain, HE never learned to dislike fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Stripped of HIS life's work and exiled after HIS unethical experiments on the survivors of the Callos IX incident were published, NAME learned the skills necessary to survive in the outer rim. Continuing HIS research with nothing left to lose, HE made minions to carry out the tasks that bored HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's lust for knowledge was only matched by HIS disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of HIS research. Traveling from world to world, HE sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Marble doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid. NAME used HIS medical skills to help the injured and the sick. HECAP believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Master trader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a master at trading. HECAP earned HIS nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld sailor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME joined HIS country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, HE eventually cracked and used the skills HE had acquired to start a mutiny on HIS ship. In the end, NAME was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. HECAP henceforth always had chefs to cook for HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mutinous captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was taken to the stars by slavers after HIS tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years HE learned the language of HIS captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat. The captain only learned of NAME's true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Neuro scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain. After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, HE joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Particle physicist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME performed cutting-edge physics research. HECAP wanted to help build a better and more peaceful future.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked HIS way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. HECAP leads HIS crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With no real care for other people, NAME fit in perfectly with the pirate crew that HE had once been a captive of. Shortly after becoming one of the crew, NAME began to kill anyone or anything that got in HIS way - including HIS crew mates.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate surveyor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a surveyor for Geotek Corporation, NAME's job was to search for new salvage sites. However, HIS real desire was to find an ancient artifact amongst the ruins to sell on the black market. When HE finally stumbled across one, the company tried to retrieve it by force. NAME escaped with HIS bounty and began a life of piracy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate trooper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME joined a renowned interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids. Though HIS combat experience made HIM a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left HIM cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a pirate leader, NAME was well-known for HIS cunning plans and chess-like traps. HECAP was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target. HISCAP name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Political activist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was involved with a radical political faction which worked against HIS homeworld's government. The guerilla tactics training that NAME received from HIS associates gave HIM the skills to fight, but also drove HIM to compromise HIS own beliefs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pop idol pirate
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME and HIS fans set out as a space pirate crew. HECAP raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread HIS name. NAME became afraid of fire when a rival burned HIS stage down. HECAP relied on HIS fans to do the work HE found unappealing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Raider king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, NAME rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew HIS name and HIS ruthlessness.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Religious hierarch
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ordained as a priest in HIS local community, NAME used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. HECAP held numerous titles and lands. One day, a merchant landed HIS spaceship near NAME's home. HECAP decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Renegade engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, NAME set HIS gaze on HIS homeworld. HECAP travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Selfless hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong. Along the way, HE helped people in need.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shaman of shadows
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the monsters of fire came from the sky, NAME was called upon by HIS tribe to guide them into battle. NAME made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. HECAP quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with HIS local enemies. This long period alone left HIM without close friends. HISCAP heart is sensitive, but HE learned to hide HIS emotions very well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space merchant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, NAME sought to dominate HIS romantic interests as much as HIS business adversaries. When HE didn't have HIS own ship to fly, HE worked charter ships for hire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space raider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, HE became the feared enemy of many settlements.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space trafficker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME discovered HE was heir of HIS distant uncle's weapons-trading business. To protect the future of the company HE went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME left HIS home behind, turning to the stars. HECAP worked HIS way from planet to planet, taking on whatever jobs HE could find to earn passage onward, rarely staying with a ship for long. Eventually HE obtained HIS own vessel and has gradually attracted a quiet but effective crew.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: State engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME enrolled in the state weapons research program. While brilliant in HIS work, HE was so enthusiastic in testing HIS creations that HE accidentally wounded some colleagues and was marked as unfit for service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, NAME was lost. HECAP survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now? For the first time in HIS life, HE had no orders, no objectives. HECAP rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: System lord
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: For NAME, ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. HECAP sought to expand HIS influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Systems engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Like HIS father, NAME was a systems engineer. HECAP was qualified in both colony and ship systems. When not working, HE would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, HE did these things mostly alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME enrolled in a scientific study that promised it could make HIM smarter. Unfortunately, the side effects were very different than HE expected.HE went insane and killed a number of people before escaping HIS homeworld.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toaster repairman
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Good with HIS hands and passionate about technology, NAME aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change HIS home world forever. A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, HE gave up on HIS dream and took a job more befitting HIS skill set.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tool mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world. After HIS firm closed due to scandal, HE joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing HIS wares between settlements.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld enforcer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld. HECAP dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld pimp
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: At first, NAME made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, HE switched to selling women and made a fortune. HECAP developed great skills with HIS fists. HECAP also learned to fix up the injuries HE inflicted on the girls.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vengeful explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A violent drifter without a home, NAME and HIS father fought many battles across hundreds of years. HECAP became a grizzled fighter and crack shot. After HIS father's death in battle, NAME began exploring the stars alone, seeking HIS father's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vinho king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After prohibition came to Aracena VI, NAME expanded HIS underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called HIM the Vinho King. Though HE mostly controlled HIS competition by masterful political maneuvering, HE was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Voidspace raider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of seeking the assassin that broke up HIS family, NAME was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. HECAP accepted, hoping to find the killer HE sought. Due to HIS seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, HE earned the nickname "Blackjack" in recognition of HIS luck.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering crafter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME continued to follow HIS parents' nomadic ways, supporting HIMself with HIS crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and HE often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put HIS skills to good use.
